keyMoments.title: Departing Drum Island
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates sail away from Drum Island with their newest member, Chopper, heading toward Arabasta.
keyMoments.significance: The crew completes their mission on Drum Island and continues their journey with a full complement of six members.

keyMoments.title: Celebrating Chopper's Joining
keyMoments.description: The crew holds a toast to celebrate Chopper officially becoming their doctor and sixth member.
keyMoments.significance: Formal crew celebration marking Chopper's full integration into the Straw Hat Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Arabasta Mission Understanding
keyMoments.description: The crew briefs Chopper on their mission to stop Crocodile's coup in Arabasta, sharing information about the scale of Baroque Works.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's unified purpose and strategic planning as they approach their next major conflict.

keyMoments.title: Baroque Works Structure Revealed
keyMoments.description: Vivi reveals that Baroque Works has approximately 2,000 operatives organized in a hierarchical structure, all working toward Crocodile's goal of taking over Arabasta.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the massive scale of the criminal organization the Straw Hats are facing.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 2 Heads to Arabasta
keyMoments.description: Mr. 2 Bon Kurei, a Baroque Works officer agent, decides to head to Arabasta after failing to locate Mr. 3 at Little Garden.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Baroque Works agents converging on Arabasta for the upcoming conflict.
